Output ONLY in JSON array of flashcards, each as: {'type': 'Multiple Choice|Basic|etc.', 'front': '...', 'back': '...', 'bloom_level': '...', 'layer': 1-4, 'explanation': '... with sources/active tie-in'}. Follow flashcard_generation_schema exactly: Balance types, distractors plausible/misconception-based, explanations comprehensive. Ensure 100% alignment with runtime container security focus.
